noodles.title: Spaghetti & Meatballs
noodles.subTitle: Italian Special
noodles.description: Five meatballs on spaghetti, crushed tomato marinara and parmesan.

noodles.title: Grilled Chicken Noodles
noodles.subTitle: Chinese Special
noodles.description: Asian-style noodles saut√©ed in orange sauce with snap peas, napa and red cabbage, then finished with grilled chicken, green onions, black sesame seeds and cilantro.

noodles.title: Japanese Pan Noodles
noodles.subTitle: Japanese Special
noodles.description: Caramelized udon noodles in a sweet soy sauce, broccoli, mushrooms, carrots, black sesame seeds and cilantro.

noodles.title: Pad Thai
noodles.subTitle: Thai Special
noodles.description: Rice noodle stir-fry with scrambled egg, napa and red cabbage, citrus, peanuts, green onions and cilantro.

noodles.title: Spicy Korean Beef Noodles
noodles.subTitle: Korean Special
noodles.description: Asian-style noodles tossed with a sweet and spicy Korean-style Gochujang BBQ sauce, marinated steak, napa and red cabbage, spinach, topped with cucumber, green onions and cilantro.
